thread.title: Train passengers make miraculous escape from BOMB blast | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Train passengers make miraculous escape from BOMB blast | Daily Mail Online

author: Rakesh Ranjan
title: Train passengers make miraculous escape from BOMB blast | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Train terror in Bihar: Passengers make miraculous escape from BOMB blast as device laid on tracks fails to cause damage - and experts now warn that India's railways have become a target Monday's explosion near Buxar gives credence to fears that sabotage and terror are behind recent train tragedies in India Security experts have now warned that Indian railways are an easy target Official claimed that there were at least 45 cases of alleged sabotage last year See more news from India at www.dailymail.co.uk/indiahome Published: 22:45 GMT, 6 February 2017 | Updated: 00:49 GMT, 7 February 2017 592 shares
